tool_description: Validates whether a proposed ticket status transition is allowed according to workflow rules and business logic.

proposed_status.description: Proposed new status for the ticket

ticket_type.description: Type of ticket: incident, request, problem, change

bypass_validation.description: Whether to bypass standard validation rules (requires admin privileges)

error_messages: Invalid current status: The current_status is not a recognized ticket status.
Invalid proposed status: The proposed_status is not a recognized ticket status.
Invalid ticket type: Use one of [incident, request, problem, change] for ticket_type.
Transition not allowed: The status transition from current_status to proposed_status is not permitted by workflow rules.
usage: Provide current_status and proposed_status to validate if the transition is allowed. Optionally specify ticket_type for type-specific validation rules.

transition_valid.description: Whether the proposed status transition is valid

allowed_transitions.description: List of valid status transitions from the current status

requires_approval.description: Whether this transition requires supervisor approval
